description: From Latin intramuralis, from intra (“within”) + muralis (“of a wall”).

adjectives.description: intramural (comparative more intramural, superlative most intramural)

entries.meaning: Within the walls; within one institution, particularly a school.
examples: Intramural sports involve teams that are all within the same school.

entries.meaning: Within the substance of the walls of an organ.
A (usually sports) competition between teams belonging to the same school.
